item.title: The Team
item.description: During the development of our application we spread the work to be done by sprints. Each sprint had a duration of 1/2 weeks and at the end of each sprint we had a meeting to discuss the work done and the work to be done in the next sprint.
item.content:encoded:
During the development of our application we spread the work to be done by sprints. Each sprint had a duration of 1/2 weeks and at the end of each sprint we had a meeting to discuss the work done and the work to be done in the next sprint.

The distribution made is listed below:

SprintScrum MasterProduct OwnerDevelopers
1Miguel FranciscoGon√ßalo MonteiroMiguel Pinto, Filipe Oliveira, Ana Loureiro
